荾字的基本解释

荾
suī
花蕊：“函荾荴以俟风兮。”
芫荽。

荾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suī］
［《廣韻》息遺切，平脂，心。］
(1)香菜的一种。
(2)花蕊。

荾字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1032第23
【唐韻】息遺切，音綏。華中齊也。【前漢·外戚傳】函荾荴以俟風兮，芳雜襲以彌章。　又與荽同，見荽字註，一作葰。【玉篇】又作䒘。

荾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
荾字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Badger
suī
Flower stamen: "The letter to the mongoose is in the wind."
Coriander.
Badger
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suī］
["Guang Yun" Xi Yi cut, flat fat, heart. ]
(1) A kind of coriander.
(2) Flower stamen.
Badger
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese characters] 　荾; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1032 to 23
[Tang Yun] Exhaust and cut, sound and sui. Central China Qi also. [Previous Han · Foreign Relations Biography] The letter of the mongoose was adored by the wind, and the miscellaneous fragrance was struck by the seal.　Same as cilantro again, see the note on cilantro, one for the same. [Jade articles] is also called 䒘.
